seo: ecshop,sql注入漏洞,高危,远程代码执行,RCE
seo_en: ecshop,SQL injection vulnerability,high risk,remote code execution,RCE
summary: 该插件用于检测Ecshop系统中存在的sql注入漏洞，可能引发远程代码执行（RCE），属于高危漏洞。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect SQL injection vulnerabilities in the Ecshop system, which may lead to remote code execution (RCE), classified as a high-risk vulnerability.
